mapper.insert:
select smt_bss_cpc_sftt_sequence.nextval
insert into obj_mkt_campaign_rel (OFFER_SCENE_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_ID, REL_TYPE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{offerSceneRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{objType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update obj_mkt_campaign_rel set MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OBJ_TYPE = #{objType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REL_TYPE = #{relType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFF_DATE = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OFFER_SCENE_REL_ID = #{offerSceneRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select OFFER_SCENE_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_ID, REL_TYPE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from obj_mkt_campaign_rel where OFFER_SCENE_REL_ID = #{offerSceneRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select OFFER_SCENE_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_ID, REL_TYPE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from obj_mkt_campaign_rel

select OFFER_SCENE_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_ID, REL_TYPE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from obj_mkt_campaign_rel where OBJ_ID = #{requestId} and OBJ_TYPE = #{type}
